question: Pencils and Erasers are an example of complementary goods as they are bought and used together. If there is a rise in the price of the pencils. It will induce which among the following?
option1: an upward shift in the demand for erasers
option2: a fall in the demand for erasers
option3: a rise in the price of erasers
option4: no impact on the demand of the erasers
answer: a fall in the demand for erasers
